description:
Jim works in forestry in the Pacific northwest.

He's 26, straight, and just out of a relationship.

He contacted us because he wanted to do something adventurous to begin the next chapter in his life.

Also, he's a surfer and the water down here is a lot warmer than where he's from.

He's got a beefy, moderately hairy body, and there's a nice upward curve to his cock that would probably hit in all the right places!
title: Jim
